title: Property

oneOf.title: Single-Value Property
oneOf.description: The property in an index. The value will be stored as a single cardinal value.

select.description: A CSS selector expression that selects nodes in the HTML (DOM) or Markdown (MDAST) syntax tree

value.description: A ES6 template literal expression that extracts the value from the matching node(s) to be stored in the index

faceted.description: Whether to enable faceted search on this property

oneOf.title: Multi-Value Property
oneOf.description: The property in an index. The value will be stored as a list of values

select.description: A CSS selector expression that selects nodes in the HTML (DOM) or Markdown (MDAST) syntax tree

values.description: A ES6 template literal expression that extracts the values from the matching nodes to be stored in the index

faceted.description: Whether to enable faceted search on this property
